messages.subject: Fires in the Yoshiwara
messages.msgSnippet: Hello everyone: I haven t posted to this forum in a while but I had a question to which I could not find the answer. It deals with the Yoshiwara or pleasure
messages.messageBody:
Hello everyone:
I haven't posted to this forum in a while but I had a question to which
I could not find the answer. It deals with the Yoshiwara or pleasure
quarter of Tokyo. According to historical events the Yoshiwara burnt
down several times since its creation in the 1600's by the Tokugawa
regime. I was wondering if anyone knew of a site or had the information
about the specific timeline of the fires such as months and years. I
would appreciate it. Thanks to all.
Rod
